detaileddescription.para: < The text of the label
< The label color
< The minimum value of the scale
< The maximum value of the scale
< The precision of graduation
< The starting color of the scale
< The ending color of the scale
< The starting color of the graduation lines
< The ending color of the graduation lines
< Paint that define the scale style
< Paint that define the graduation style
< Paint that define the label style
< Whether a label should be displayed
< The X coordinate of the text label
< The Y coordinate of the text label

< The boundaries of the scale itself Class constructor taking only a context. Use this constructor to create ColoredScale objects from your own code.
Class constructor taking a context and an attribute set. This constructor is used by the layout engine to construct a ColoredScale from a set of XML attributes.

parameterdescription.para: An attribute set which can contain attributes from R.styleable.ColoredScale as well as attributes inherited from android.view.View.

detaileddescription.para: Returns true if the text label should be visible.

simplesect.para: True if the text label should be visible, false otherwise.

detaileddescription.para: Controls whether the text label is visible or not. Setting this property to false allows the colored scale graphic to take up the entire visible area of the control.

parameterdescription.para: true if the text label should be visible, false otherwise

detaileddescription.para: Returns the Y position of the label text, in pixels.

simplesect.para: The Y position of the label text, in pixels.

detaileddescription.para: Set the Y position of the label text, in pixels.

parameterdescription.para: the Y position of the label text, in pixels.

detaileddescription.para: Returns the width reserved for label text, in pixels.

simplesect.para: The width reserved for label text, in pixels.

detaileddescription.para: Set the width of the area reserved for label text. This width is constant; it does not change based on the actual width of the label as the label text changes.

parameterdescription.para: The width reserved for label text, in pixels.

detaileddescription.para: Returns the height of the label font, in pixels.

simplesect.para: The height of the label font, in pixels.

detaileddescription.para: Set the height of the label font, in pixels.

parameterdescription.para: The height of the label font, in pixels.

detaileddescription.para: Initialize some size independant attributes. This code is in a separate method so that it can be called from both constructors.
Utility to reconcile a desired size and state, with constraints imposed by a MeasureSpec. The original resolveSizeAndState requires API lvl 11. This version is meant to replace it for older version.

parameterdescription.para: How big the view wants to be

simplesect.para: Size information bit mask as defined by MEASURED_SIZE_MASK and MEASURED_STATE_TOO_SMALL.

memberdef.argsstring: (int w, int h, int oldw, int oldh)
memberdef.name: onSizeChanged
